component.name: getGroup
component.description: Returns REST representation for the requested group

component.name: addUserToGroup
component.description: Adds the specified user to the specified group

component.name: removeUserFromGroup
component.description: Removes the specified user from the specified group

component.name: createGroup
component.description: Creates a group with the given name

component.name: deleteGroup
component.description: Deletes the specified group by name

component.name: getGroupUsers
component.description: Returns all users of a specified group
